name: Cycling Through the Golden Triangle
description:
This cycling tour covers the famous ‘Golden Triangle of North India’ which includes visit to Delhi, Agra and Jaipur. This tour offers contrasting experiences of Mughal, Rajput and British eras in India and also depicts the richness of India’s bygone history.

Originating and concluding in Delhi, this cycling tour will take the visitors to some of the exquisite locations, offering them a delightful opportunity to explore these places on wheels. The village tours within this itinerary will enable the cyclists to know the various traditions and cultures around the places and will also bring them closer the aspects of life.
